title: Documentation - InputConfig
abstract:
# Documentation - InputConfig
The desired input location and metadata.| JSON representation       |
|:--------------------------------------------|
| { "content": string, "mimeType": string } || Fields | Fields.1                                                                                 |
|:---------|:-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| content | string (bytes format) File content, represented as a stream of bytes. Note: As with all bytes fields, protobuffers use a pure binary representation, whereas JSON representations use base64.Currently, this field only works for files.annotate requests. It does not work for files.asyncBatchAnnotate requests.A base64-encoded string. |
| mimeType | string The type of the file. Currently only "application/pdf", "image/tiff" and "image/gif" are supported. Wildcards are not supported.
